statements: SELECT * FROM classic_cars ORDER BY model ASC;
SELECT id, model, manufacturer FROM classic_cars WHERE production_year > 1970;
SELECT * FROM classic_cars WHERE engine_size >= 3.0;
SELECT model, color FROM classic_cars WHERE transmission IS NULL;
SELECT id, manufacturer, production_year FROM classic_cars ORDER BY production_year DESC, manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM classic_cars WHERE production_year > 2000 ORDER BY manufacturer DESC
SELECT model, manufacturer, color FROM classic_cars WHERE engine_size >= 2.0
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS car_count FROM classic_cars GROUP BY manufacturer ORDER BY car_count DESC
SELECT model, engine_size, color FROM classic_cars WHERE color IN ('Red', 'Blue', 'Green') ORDER BY engine_size ASC
SELECT manufacturer, production_year FROM classic_cars WHERE transmission IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM classic_cars;
SELECT model, production_year FROM classic_cars WHERE production_year > 2000;
SELECT model, specifications->>'color' as color FROM classic_cars WHERE model = 'Mustang';
SELECT * FROM classic_cars ORDER BY production_year DESC;
SELECT model, production_year FROM classic_cars WHERE specifications->>'engine_size' > '3.0' ORDER BY production_year;
SELECT * FROM classic_cars WHERE production_year > 2000 ORDER BY model DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, model, production_year FROM classic_cars WHERE model LIKE '%Mustang%' AND production_year >= 1965;
SELECT id, model, jsonb_pretty(specifications) FROM classic_cars WHERE jsonb_typeof(specifications) = 'object';
SELECT cc.id, cc.model, m.name AS manufacturer_name FROM classic_cars cc JOIN manufacturers m ON cc.id = m.id;
SELECT model, count(*) AS total_count FROM classic_cars GROUP BY model HAVING count(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT car_id, car_name, manufacturer, production_year FROM ClassicCarModels;
SELECT * FROM CarSpecifications WHERE horsepower > 300;
SELECT car_id, manufacturer, production_year FROM ClassicCarModels WHERE manufacturer = 'Ferrari';
SELECT car_id, car_name FROM ClassicCarModels ORDER BY production_year DESC;
SELECT car_name, engine_type, horsepower FROM ClassicCarModels JOIN CarSpecifications ON ClassicCarModels.car_id = CarSpecifications.car_id;
SELECT * FROM ClassicCarModels WHERE production_year > 1970;
SELECT car_name, manufacturer, production_year FROM ClassicCarModels WHERE car_id = 3;
SELECT car_name, engine_type, horsepower FROM ClassicCarModels JOIN CarSpecifications ON ClassicCarModels.car_id = CarSpecifications.car_id;
SELECT car_name, start_year, end_year FROM ClassicCarModels INNER JOIN ProductionYears ON ClassicCarModels.car_id = ProductionYears.car_id;
SELECT manufacturer, engine_type, horsepower, torque FROM ClassicCarModels JOIN CarSpecifications ON ClassicCarModels.car_id = CarSpecifications.car_id WHERE production_year BETWEEN 1960 AND 1970;
SELECT * FROM classic_car_models ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM classic_car_models WHERE production_year > 1980 ORDER BY production_year DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM classic_car_models GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT model_name, engine_size, horsepower FROM classic_car_models JOIN car_specifications ON classic_car_models.car_id = car_specifications.car_id WHERE engine_size LIKE '%V8%';
SELECT model_name, image_url FROM classic_car_models JOIN car_images ON classic_car_models.car_id = car_images.car_id WHERE car_images.image_url IS NOT NULL ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer, country_of_origin FROM classic_car_models;
SELECT * FROM classic_car_models WHERE production_year > 1980;
SELECT model_name, engine_size, top_speed FROM classic_car_models JOIN car_specifications ON classic_car_models.car_id = car_specifications.car_id;
SELECT cc.model_name, ps.average_price FROM classic_car_models cc JOIN production_years ps ON cc.production_year = ps.production_year;
SELECT cc.model_name, ci.image_url FROM classic_car_models cc JOIN car_images ci ON cc.car_id = ci.car_id;
SELECT * FROM classic_car_models;
SELECT name, brand, production_year FROM classic_car_models;
SELECT brand, name FROM classic_car_models ORDER BY production_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM car_specifications WHERE horsepower > 200;
SELECT model_id, engine_type, fuel_type FROM car_specifications WHERE fuel_type = 'Gasoline';
SELECT * FROM classic_car_models WHERE production_year > 1970 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT brand, COUNT(*) FROM classic_car_models GROUP BY brand HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;

SELECT m.name, s.engine_type, p.year FROM classic_car_models m JOIN car_specifications s ON m.id = s.model_id JOIN production_years p ON p.year = m.production_year WHERE s.horsepower > 200 ORDER BY p.year DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT c.name, i.image_url FROM classic_car_models c JOIN car_images i ON c.id = i.model_id WHERE c.name LIKE 'Ford%' ORDER BY c.name ASC, i.image_url DESC;
SELECT r.reviewer_name, r.review_text, m.name FROM car_reviews r JOIN classic_car_models m ON r.model_id = m.id WHERE r.review_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY r.reviewer_name ASC, m.name ASC;
